definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Whatever comes out, you will see that on this timer.
sentences.chinese: 無論結果是什麼，你會在計時器上看到。

sentences.english: I still can't believe you didn't tell us about it, " said Ron grumpily ."
sentences.chinese: 你竟然不告訴我們有關計時器的事，我仍舊不能相信。

sentences.english: This new age mobile application Egg Timer will keep you roast tender and the smoke away.
sentences.chinese: 這個新時代的移動應用煮蛋計時器將讓您烤嫩和煙了。

sentences.english: Electronic short-term timer up to 90 min.
sentences.chinese: 電子短期計時器達90分鐘。

sentences.english: The utility model not only can be used as a timer, but also can control in multi-path according to a pre-program.
sentences.chinese: 它既可做計時器，又可按預編程序進行多路控制。

sentences.english: And so we do have a timer.
sentences.chinese: 而我恰好有這樣的計時器。

sentences.english: I set my countdown timer alarm for 30 minutes right when I lie down.
sentences.chinese: 每次我按下30分鐘倒數計時器鬧鈴，然後就躺下。

sentences.english: This timer is used to determine the retransmit interval.
sentences.chinese: 這隻計時器用來決定重送間隔。

sentences.english: Waters glanced at the chronometer and whispered, Sir, thirteen minutes to go.
sentences.chinese: 沃特斯盯着計時器輕聲說，長官，十三分鐘過去了。

sentences.english: VB to create long-timer , though not original, but very useful.
sentences.chinese: VB中創建超長時間計時器，雖非原創，但很有用。

sentences.english: The retransmission timer is inserted into an appropriate slot in the timer wheel.
sentences.chinese: 將重新傳輸計時器插入到計時器輪中合適的槽位。

sentences.english: The retransmission timer is inserted into an appropriate slot in the timer wheel.
sentences.chinese: 將重新傳輸計時器插入到計時器輪中合適的槽位。

sentences.english: The SGSN supervises the paging procedure with a timer.
sentences.chinese: SGSN通過一個計時器來監管尋呼流程。

sentences.english: One of the engineers working with Daykin had designed a circuit that relied on a bimetallic timer.
sentences.chinese: 迪肯的一個同事曾設計過依賴雙金屬計時器的線路。

sentences.english: This code creates a timer when the user presses a key.
sentences.chinese: 此代碼在用戶按鍵時創建一個計時器。
